SEARCH
Module camp_management_and_application_system
Package services

Class EnquiryStudentService

java.lang.Object
services.EnquiryStudentService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnquiryStudentService
public class EnquiryStudentService extends Object implements IEnquiryStudentService
EnquiryStudentService implemets IEnquiryStudentService interface and provide enquiry related functions for a student user for selected camp
